channel.title: DeXPeriX Home Page : Translations
channel.description: Here are the translations of articles, programs, help pages, etc.

item.title: Russian translation of Ario player
item.description:
Ario (http://ario-player.sourceforge.net/) is a GTK2 client for MPD (Music player daemon). The interface used to browse the library is inspired by Rhythmbox but Ario aims to be much lighter and faster.

It runs on Linux and Microsoft Windows.

item.title: BitDefender 9 rusificator
item.description: Translation to russian of BitDefender 9 - BitDefender 9 Russification. This translation completely written by me and unique. At this site you can always find its latest version. Comments and suggestions write to feedback.

item.title: BitDefender 8.0 rusificator
item.description:
Translator BitDefender 8.0 antivirus to russian language.

Collected from several, but he did not truncate functionality, better than other translations.
